src:
Xiaomi Mi Note 10 to arrive in Spain on November 6th - Gizchina.com
03 Nov 2019, 14:38 by Efe Udin
Xiaomi Mi Note 10 to arrive in Spain on November 6th3.5 (69.09%) 11 votes
Chinese manufacturer, Xiaomi, has an event on November 5th in China where it will release a couple of products which include Xiaomi CC9 Pro, Xiaomi Watch and Xiaomi TV 5. The CC9 Pro is considered as a version of the Xiaomi Mi Note 10 and earlier reports claim that the Note 10 will arrive in Spain on November 11. However. a new report from GadgetsFlix claims that it will come earlier. In fact, just a day after the CC9 Pro launch in China – November 6th.



According to previous information, the Mi Note 10 series will have two versions – Xiaomi Mi Note 10 and Note 10 Pro. Both phones already have NBTC and EEC certifications which means that they will arrive in parts of Europe and Asia. The Mi Note 10 just like the CC9 Pro will be the first smartphone with a 108MP camera.



According to Geekbench listing, the Mi Note 10 comes with model number “M1910F4G” while the Pro model is “M1910F4S”. The information from Geekbench basically confirms that the Mi Note 10 is the foreign version of Xiaomi CC9 Pro. Amongst other features, the Note 10 Pro will come with a Snapdragon 855+ SoC, 6.7-inch AMOLED display and 40W fast charging. 

Via
